titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Trinidad and Tobago
Trinidad and Tobago

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The government of Trinidad and Tobago passed a Freedom of Information Act in 1999 that went into effect in 2001. Members of the public may apply for access to government documents older than 10 years.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives: 105 St. Vincent Street, P.O. Box 763, Port of Spain.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should write to the FOI Unit of the Ministry of Public Administration and Information to request access to Foreign Ministry documents.
